org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow.core

Interface IMessageReadWrite

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MessageReadWriteService, SecureMessageReadWriteService

    public interface IMessageReadWrite
    This interface defines low level routines to read/write messages on an open socket channel. If secure communication is desired, these methods also perform encryption and decryption of the network data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void asyncSend(org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage msg)
      Sends the OF message out over the socket channel.
      java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage> readMessages()
      Reads the incoming network data from the socket and retrieves the OF messages.
      void resumeSend()
      Resumes sending the remaining messages in the outgoing buffer
      void stop()
      Proper clean up when the switch connection is closed

    • Method Detail

      • asyncSend

        void asyncSend(org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage msg)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends the OF message out over the socket channel. For secure communication, the data will be encrypted.
        Parameters:
        msg - OF message to be sent
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • resumeSend

        void resumeSend()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Resumes sending the remaining messages in the outgoing buffer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • readMessages

        java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.OFMessage> readMessages()
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads the incoming network data from the socket and retrieves the OF messages. For secure communication, the data will be decrypted first.
        Returns:
        list of OF messages
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • stop

        void stop()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Proper clean up when the switch connection is closed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
